title: Incorrect help message in internal compiler error

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I'm compiling a crate called `sc-client-db`. Compilation failed with the message:

```
cargo test --all-features -p sc-client-db                                                                                                                                 101 ↵
   Compiling sc-client-db v0.10.0-dev (/Users/marek/projects/ethcore/substrate/client/db)
error: internal compiler error: encountered incremental compilation error with evaluate_obligation(3cc87741171218cf-9046f54b55f4b568)
  |
  = help: This is a known issue with the compiler. Run `cargo clean -p sc_client_db` or `cargo clean` to allow your project to compile
  = note: Please follow the instructions below to create a bug report with the provided information
  = note: See <https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/84970> for more information
```

Compiler incorrectly suggests to run command

```
cargo clean -p sc_client_db
```

instead of

```
cargo clean -p sc-client-db
```
